content.raw:
a26c151 for const auto, although irritatingly it creates a code check issue (based on the old definition of auto, I believe):

```
./gazebo/physics/PresetManager.cc:53:  Storage class (static, extern, typedef, etc) should be first.  [build/storage_class] [5]
./gazebo/physics/PresetManager.cc:209:  Storage class (static, extern, typedef, etc) should be first.  [build/storage_class] [5]
```

Can these be ignored?
